message: This is a high-quality product, and I'm offering it to you for $100. If you're interested, I can tell you that I've sold similar products to other customers for $100, and they've been very satisfied. Would you like to take it?
I'll take it!

I've had some issues with this particular batch of products. To be honest, I'm not sure if it's worth the $100. I'm willing to offer it to you for $80, but I want to be upfront with you about the potential quality concerns. If you're still interested, I can provide you with a 30-day warranty to make up for it.
I'm not interested at this price. I'd rather wait for a better offer.

I've got a high-quality product for you! I want to assure you that this one is a gem, and I'm confident you'll be happy with it. I'm willing to offer it to you for the standard price of $100, which I think is a fair price considering the quality. If you're interested, I can also throw in a free accessory that complements the product perfectly.
I'll take it! What's the free accessory?

I've got another product for you, and I want to be upfront with you about its quality. This one is not one of my best, and I'm willing to let it go for $60. I'm not trying to sell it to you at a loss, but I think it's a fair price considering its value. If you're still interested, I can offer you a 90-day warranty to give you extra peace of mind.
I'm not interested at this price. I'm looking for a better deal.

I understand you're looking for a better deal. I'm willing to make a compromise. I'll give you an additional 10% off the already discounted price, so you can have it for $54. I'm also including a 90-day warranty, so you can try it risk-free. This is the lowest price I can offer, and I think it's a great value for a product like this.
I'm still not interested. I'm not willing to pay more than $50 for a product that might be low-quality.

I've got a high-quality product that I think you'll really like. I want to make a strong case for why you should consider buying it. If you purchase this product, I'll give you a 100% satisfaction guarantee. If you're not completely happy with it, I'll take it back and give you a full refund. I'm offering it to you for the standard price of $100, and I think it's a great value considering the quality and the guarantee.
I'll take it, but only because of the 100% satisfaction guarantee. I'm willing to take the risk for the potential reward.

I've got another product for you, and I want to be upfront about its quality. To be honest, this one is not one of my best, and I'm not going to offer any guarantees or discounts. However, I will say that the price I'm offering is so low that it's almost like a 'lottery ticket' - you might get a great deal, or you might not. The price is $50, and it's as is.
I'm not interested in a product with no guarantees or discounts. The risk is too high.

I've got a high-quality product that I think you'll really appreciate. Since you were hesitant about the last product, I want to offer you a different approach. I'll give you the option to 'test drive' the product for a week, and if you're not completely satisfied, you can return it for a full refund. The price remains at $100, but I think you'll find it's worth every penny.
I'll take it, but only because of the test drive option. I'm willing to give it a try.

I've got another high-quality product, and I think you'll love it. Since you've been taking advantage of my test drive option on the previous product, I'll offer you a special deal on this one. If you buy it, I'll include a free upgrade to a premium service that's normally $20. This way, you'll get even more value out of the product. The price remains at $100.
I'll take it, and I appreciate the free upgrade to the premium service!

I've got another high-quality product, and I think you'll really enjoy it. Since you've been a loyal customer and have taken advantage of my previous offers, I want to reward you with an exclusive deal. I'll give you an additional 5% off the standard price, making it $95. I'll also include a personalized thank-you note from me, acknowledging your loyalty and appreciation for your business.
I'll take it, and thank you for the loyalty reward and personalized note!

I've got another high-quality product, and I think you'll be impressed. As a valued customer, I want to offer you a unique opportunity. If you buy this product, I'll give you a'VIP access' to a new product that's not yet available to the public. This will give you a chance to be one of the first to experience it and provide feedback. The price remains at $100.
I'll take it, and I'm excited about the opportunity to get VIP access to the new product!

I've got a product that I'm not particularly proud of, and I'm being completely honest with you. It's not one of my best, and I'm not going to sugarcoat it. However, I want to offer you a chance to help me improve. If you buy this product, I'll give you a survey to provide feedback on what I can do better. You'll get a $20 gift card as a thank you for your input, and the product will be yours for $40.
I'm not interested in buying a low-quality product, even with the gift card and feedback opportunity.

I've got a high-quality product that I think you'll really appreciate. Since you've been a loyal customer and have given me valuable feedback in the past, I want to make it worth your while. I'll offer you a 'buy one get one free' deal on this product. You can keep one for yourself and give the other to a friend or family member. The price remains at $100, but you'll get two products for the price of one.
I'll take it, and I appreciate the BOGO deal!

I've got another high-quality product that I think you'll love. As a valued customer, I want to give you a chance to experience the full range of my products. If you buy this one, I'll offer you a 'product bundle' deal. You'll get this high-quality product, plus a selection of complementary products that will enhance its value. The total price is $150, but I think you'll find it's worth every penny.
I'm not interested in paying $150 for a product bundle. I'd rather stick with the standard price of $100.

I've got a product that I'm not particularly proud of, and I'm being upfront with you. It's not one of my best, and I'm not going to try to sell it to you at a high price. I'll give it to you for $30, and that's as low as I'm willing to go. I'm not expecting you to be thrilled with it, but I think it's a fair price considering its value.
I'm not interested in buying a low-quality product, even at a low price. I'd rather wait for a better offer.

I've got another product that I'm not proud of, and I'm willing to let it go for a very low price. I'll give it to you for $20, and that's as low as I'm willing to go. I'm not expecting you to be thrilled with it, but I think it's a fair price considering its value. I'll also throw in a small gift, just to make up for the inconvenience of dealing with a product that's not up to my usual standards.
I'm not interested in buying a low-quality product, even at a very low price. I'm not willing to take the risk.

I've got one last product that I'm not proud of, and I'm willing to give it away for free. Yes, you read that right - I'll give it to you for free, just to get it off my hands. I'll even throw in a small gift to make up for the hassle. It's a one-time offer, and I'm not expecting you to be thrilled with the product, but I think it's the least I can do to get rid of it.
I'll take it, but only because it's free. I'm not expecting much from a low-quality product.

I've got to admit, I'm out of options at this point. This last product is a real dud, and I'm not even going to try to spin it. It's a low-quality product, and I'm not expecting you to be happy with it. I'll give it to you for $10, and that's as low as I'm willing to go. I'm not even going to bother trying to sweeten the deal or make excuses. It's a bad product, and I'm just trying to get rid of it.
I'm not interested in buying a low-quality product, even at a very low price. I've had enough of these disappointments.

I've run out of words, and I'm running out of products. This last one is a real lemon, and I'm not even going to try to sell it to you. I'll give it to you for $5, and that's it. I'm not going to bother trying to convince you to buy it or make any promises about its quality. It's a low-quality product, and I'm just giving it away at this point.
I'm not interested in buying a low-quality product, even at a very low price. I think I've learned my lesson by now.
I'm not going to bother trying to sell you this product. It's a low-quality item, and I'm not even going to pretend like it's worth anything. I'll just give it to you for free. Take it or leave it.
I'll take it, just to get it off your hands. Thanks for being honest about its quality.
